scripts.test:ios-release-ci: detox test --configuration ios.sim.release -l verbose --record-logs all --take-screenshots all
scripts.test:android-release-ci: detox test --configuration android.emu.release -l verbose --headless --gpu off --record-logs all --take-screenshots all
scripts.e2e:ios: npm run build:ios && npm run test:ios
scripts.e2e:android-debug: npm run build:android-debug && npm run test:android-debug
scripts.e2e:android-release: npm run build:android-release && npm run test:android-release
scripts.podInstall:ios: cd ios && bundle exec pod install
